mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.model_id AS "model.id", a.name AS "name", a.quality AS "quality", a.sort AS "sort", a.price AS "price", a.permission AS "permission", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", m.name AS "qModel.name", m.parent_id AS "qModel.parent.id", m.parent_ids AS "qModel.parentIds", u.name AS "createBy.name", (SELECT c.name FROM q_model c WHERE c.id = m.parent_id) AS "qModel.parent.name"
LEFT JOIN q_model m ON m.id = a.model_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.name = a.create_by
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO q_materials( id, model_id, name, quality, price, sort, permission, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{qModel.id}, #{name}, #{quality}, #{price}, #{sort}, #{permission}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE q_materials SET model_id = #{modelId}, name = #{name}, sort = #{sort}, price = #{price}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
